pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a wide, scenic aerial shot of the Vancouver skyline. The camera is largely stationary, offering a panoramic view of the city nestled between the water and mountains. In the foreground, there are residential buildings and lush green trees, with the dense downtown core of skyscrapers rising in the distance against the backdrop of a prominent mountain range under a blue, partly cloudy sky.
